name: Chateau Garden
description: In this enchanting Match 3 game for garden lovers you create a romantic chateau garden for the princess. The Match 3 levels will let you play with roses, mirrors and royal jewellery. That way you can earn enough money to create a wonderful garden.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista/7/8/10 Processor: 1.5 GHz Memory: 256 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0a Storage: 700 MB available space
